subject: Web3
title: DAOs and Traditional Organizations
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on DAOs and Traditional Organizations.

hook.text: Traditional companies are studying DAOs. Transparent treasuries and community governance appeal to a new generation.

buildup.text: Some cooperatives and nonprofits are exploring DAO tools for decision-making and fund management.

discovery.text: Hybrid models are emerging â€” legal entities that use DAO tools for governance but maintain traditional structures.

twist.text: Most traditional organizations don't want full decentralization. They want the tools, not the ideology.

climax.text: DAOs may have their biggest impact not as replacements for companies but as tools that make existing organizations better.

punchline.text: DAOs won't replace companies. They'll make companies more transparent.

quiz.question: How might DAOs most impact traditional organizations?
options: By providing governance tools that improve transparency and participation
